name: 德國史（一）
description:
中文課程簡介: 從本世紀初法國大革命的影響到世紀末統一德國的帝國雄圖，這門課要介紹十九世紀德國主要的政治、經濟、社會和文化發展。這段期間內種種對立力量的拉扯:
民族運動的盛行與三十多個邦聯的破碎狀態、拿破崙戰爭後的復闢與自由主義的興起、革命與反革命、普魯士及奧地利的爭霸、資本主義經濟與工人運動興起等，皆在這段德國歷史中，扮演了重要的角色。用英文授課!
goals: Students will be enabled to understand impact of the various factors in historical developments
Students will become aware of the transformative character of the 19th century for modern Germany
Students will become aware of the interrelations between political, economic, social and cultural forces
syllabus:
9/11   Introduction: Germany in the Late 18th Century

9/18   Repercussions of the French Revolution

9/25   Germany under Napoleon& Reforms from Above

10/02  停課10/4, 17.30h! Rulers, States and Identities in a Changing Society

10/09  Development of Political Life& Revolution 1848

10/16  Counter-Revolution, Failure and the Age of Reaction

10/23  Industrialisation, Migration, Urbanisation - Change of the Social Structure

10/30  Culture of Progress; Religion and Doubts

11/06  The Process of Unification

11/13  Germany under Bismarck

11/20  The New Economic Order

11/27  Wilhelmine Germany

12/04  Culture, Revolt and Anti-Modernism

12/11  Women in the Empire

12/18  The German Empire in Transnational Perspective

12/25  The Road to War

01/01  停課

01/08  期末考

methodologies.note: Teacher will introduce the core content of each historical phase
Each session will conclude with a time slot for concluding remarks from both teacher and students
Students will be encouraged to raise questions on both, content and language levels, and will have the chance to contribute to the solutions
Students will be working together on selected sources and documents

grading.note: Written exam about the core content of the course
Individual presentation on targeted assignment; the content of the presentation has to be handed in as a 1000 word written text in English within two weeks after the presentation!
